div.p:
Success With Every
Child In Mind

td.br:
eLearning:
The Board and Staff of Eastside STREAM Academy are very concerned about our scholars and their ability to continue to learn during this unprecedented school closure. As we try to make life as near to normal as we can for our scholars, we are implementing ESA@Home, our digital learning schedule, on March 23, 2020. With ESA@Home, our scholars will receive 3-hours of teacher led instruction each day. Each teacher will be sending their scholars specific course schedules. As always, please let us know if you need any assistance.

Coronovirus Update:
According to the Center for Disease Control (CDC), while the students are at home, parents should teach them about healthy practices to help protect against the disease. Those lessons should include washing hands properly and staying away from people who cough and sneeze. Also, parents can disinfect doorknobs, light switches and other household surfaces that kids may touch. Go to https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/prepare/children-faq.html for additional information.
We are still enrolling simply click on "Admissions" scroll down and complete the form. Call the office at 980-272-8308 for additional questions.
